
## Slope

```{r slope, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
s1 = read_s(file1, type1)
s2 = read_s(file2, type2)
s.diff = diff_s(s1, s2)
s.rmse.station = rmse_s(s.diff, "Station")
s.rmse.time = rmse_s(s.diff, "Time")

s.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_s) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Slope Differences at Stations")
s.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_s) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Slope RMSE at Stations")
s.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_s) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Slope RMSE Through Time")
```
